p: Although a number of reviews [ 11, 13, 55, 60, 61] have discussed the food nanotechnology investment and the emerging applications of nanotechnology for primary production, there are no reviews addressing oil nanoencapsulation when considering oil as the encapsulated material. Furthermore, there are many reviews on nanotechnology applications [ 13, 53, 55, 61– 68], and most of them focus on nanotechnology in food applications [ 13, 52, 55, 61– 68].
